text: Jojo's Circus is a stop motion animated series created by the person, David Campbell and production company, Cuppa Coffee Productions. The series was written by Douglas Wood, who was a creative executive for Steven Spielberg's Tiny Toon Adventures and Animaniacs, The series songs were composed by Jeffrey Zahn and Jim Latham. The lyrics were finished by Judy Rothman, The theme song was being preformed by Becky. the series was airing on Playhouse Disney in 2003 to 2007, It was marked the first stop motion series that Jim Jinkins was done by himself. There was a spin off of the series called "Feeling Good with Jojo ". The series includes everyday lessons, personal hygiene, playing with friends, safety and responsibility. The series starts off with Jojo a female clown who is 6 years old and she has a pet lion named Goliath and they both learn together at the Little Big Top Circus School. And they live in a fantasy town called "Circus Town". and Jojo has a teacher named Ms. Kersplatski. Category:2000s American animated television series Category:2007 Canadian television series endings
title: JoJo's Circus
